Kain Warwick, a DeFi pioneer and founder of Synthetix and Infinex, is featured on The Defiant Podcast with Camila Russo. This interview occurs during a pivotal moment for Warwick's Infinex project, which has just completed its INX token sale and is preparing for its Token Generation Event (TGE).
